title: Trump: Mueller team will be meddling in midterms
content:
President Trump Donald John TrumpGOP senators balk at lengthy impeachment trial Warren goes local in race to build 2020 movement 2020 Democrats make play for veterans ' votes MORE suggested on Tuesday that special counsel Robert Mueller Robert ( Bob ) Swan MuellerSpeier says impeachment inquiry shows 'very strong case of bribery ' by Trump Gowdy : I '100 percent ' still believe public congressional hearings are ' a circus ' Comey : Mueller 'did n't succeed in his mission because there was inadequate transparency ' MORE 's team of investigators is planning to meddle in this year 's midterm elections and urged Republican lawmakers to `` stay tough '' in the coming months .
`` The 13 Angry Democrats ( plus people who worked 8 years for Obama ) working on the rigged Russia Witch Hunt , will be MEDDLING with the mid-term elections , especially now that Republicans ( stay tough ! ) are taking the lead in Polls , '' Trump tweeted .
`` There was no Collusion , except by the Democrats ! '' he added .
The 13 Angry Democrats ( plus people who worked 8 years for Obama ) working on the rigged Russia Witch Hunt , will be MEDDLING with the mid-term elections , especially now that Republicans ( stay tough ! ) are taking the lead in Polls . There was no Collusion , except by the Democrats ! — Donald J. Trump ( @ realDonaldTrump ) May 29 , 2018
Trump 's tweet is the latest in a series of posts lashing out at investigators — whom he has dubbed the `` 13 Angry Democrats '' — examining possible collusion between his presidential campaign and Russia in the 2016 election .
Trump has repeatedly insisted that the special counsel investigation and those working on it are biased against him and that the probe amounts to a partisan effort to undermine and discredit his presidency .
He has also repeatedly asserted that his former Democratic opponent , Hillary Clinton Hillary Diane Rodham Clinton2020 Democrats make play for veterans ' votes The Memo : Democrats confront prospect of long primary Manafort sought to hurt Clinton 2016 campaign efforts in key states : NYT MORE , should be under investigation instead of him — a claim he repeated in another Tuesday morning tweet .

President Trump Donald John TrumpGOP senators balk at lengthy impeachment trial Warren goes local in race to build 2020 movement 2020 Democrats make play for veterans' votes MORE suggested on Tuesday that special counsel Robert Mueller Robert (Bob) Swan MuellerSpeier says impeachment inquiry shows 'very strong case of bribery' by Trump Gowdy: I '100 percent' still believe public congressional hearings are 'a circus' Comey: Mueller 'didn't succeed in his mission because there was inadequate transparency' MORE's team of investigators is planning to meddle in this year's midterm elections and urged Republican lawmakers to "stay tough" in the coming months.

"The 13 Angry Democrats (plus people who worked 8 years for Obama) working on the rigged Russia Witch Hunt, will be MEDDLING with the mid-term elections, especially now that Republicans (stay tough!) are taking the lead in Polls," Trump tweeted.

"There was no Collusion, except by the Democrats!" he added.

The 13 Angry Democrats (plus people who worked 8 years for Obama) working on the rigged Russia Witch Hunt, will be MEDDLING with the mid-term elections, especially now that Republicans (stay tough!) are taking the lead in Polls. There was no Collusion, except by the Democrats! — Donald J. Trump (@realDonaldTrump) May 29, 2018

ADVERTISEMENT

Trump's tweet is the latest in a series of posts lashing out at investigators — whom he has dubbed the "13 Angry Democrats" — examining possible collusion between his presidential campaign and Russia in the 2016 election.

Trump has repeatedly insisted that the special counsel investigation and those working on it are biased against him and that the probe amounts to a partisan effort to undermine and discredit his presidency.

He has also repeatedly asserted that his former Democratic opponent, Hillary Clinton Hillary Diane Rodham Clinton2020 Democrats make play for veterans' votes The Memo: Democrats confront prospect of long primary Manafort sought to hurt Clinton 2016 campaign efforts in key states: NYT MORE, should be under investigation instead of him — a claim he repeated in another Tuesday morning tweet.
